post.Title: Java desktop links of the week, November 16
post.Content:
Some great links this week - enjoy! :-)

  • Dirk Lemmerman has two additional 'JavaFX Real-World Apps' posts that I missed during JavaOne. Firstly, 'EIZO CuratOR Caliop', and secondly, 'Emirates Airlines Network Capacity Optimization'.
  • Hendrik Ebbers has announced the release of 'Dolphin Platform'. You can learn more about this project from the Dolphin Platform website.
  • Speaking of the Dolphin Platform, Sven Reimers interviewed Michael Heinrichs and Hendrik Ebbers about this project recently whilst at Devoxx.
  • Speaking of Devoxx, the Gluon blog has an overview of Gluon activities at Devoxx, including an hour-long presentation by Johan Vos, as well as a shorter interview with him.
  • Speaking of Gluon, there is also a blog post from there about the recent RoboVM closed-sourcing of their library, and the implications of this on Gluon and the JavaFXPorts open source project.
